text:
RELIGION

Arulmigu Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple, Srirangam : Panguni car festival, Namperumal purappadu from sanctum sanctorum, 3 p.m.; reaching Garuda Mandapam, 3.15 p.m.; purappadu from the mandapam, 6.30 p.m.; reaching vagana mandapam, 7 p.m.; purappadu in Alum pallakku, 7.30 p.m.; reaching sanctum sanctorum, 9.30 p.m.

Sri Pundarikasha Perumal Temple, Thiruvellarai : Ratha utsavam, Perumal Thayar purappadu from sanctum sanctorum, 4.45 a.m.; reaching Anantharayar Mandapam, 5 a.m.; dwajarohanam, 5.45 a.m.; purappadu in thiruvichigai, 7.15 p.m.; reaching Thayar Sannidhi, 8 p.m.; thirumanjanam, 8 p.m.; reaching kannadi arai, 10 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha : Sahasranama parayanam, Sri Desikan Sannidhi, Srirangam Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple, 6 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam : Sri Rama Nama parayanam, 55, SMESC Colony, I Main Street, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

District Administration : Systemic Voter Education and Electoral Participation programme, Thuraiyur taluk office, 10 a.m.
title: tiruchi today
